comments.author: Dave
comments.body: JG and I had a great trek up Kohler... Saw Sir Brian on top. It's nice hiking for a change, though I really miss running. Gotta' say though, my left knee is so whacked now that I doubt I could run for the bus. Bummer. NIce having JG along to absorb all my whining.

comments.author: Jennifer
comments.body: While D composted his knee, I added a wobble and back extension to my very own bowling injury. Yes, that's right, I bowled a 138 on Tuesday. Afterwards my left leg was sore from all those strikes. Now I'm a mess getting out of a chair. Somebody bring me lunch!

comments.author: Jennifer
comments.body: Oh, and happy belated bday, Mr. Bailey!
